com.gemalto.idp.mobile.authentication

Interface AuthService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BioFingerprintAuthService, FaceAuthService, PinAuthService

    public interface AuthService
    The authentication service interface.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthMode getAuthMode()
      Get authentication mode reference corresponding to this service.
      boolean isConfigured()
      Indicates if the authentication mode is configured and ready for use.
      boolean isSupported()
      Indicates if the authentication mode is supported by the hardware.

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthMode

        AuthMode getAuthMode()
        Get authentication mode reference corresponding to this service.
        Returns:
        current auth mode.

      • isSupported

        boolean isSupported()
        Indicates if the authentication mode is supported by the hardware.
        Returns:
        true if supported, else return false.

      • isConfigured

        boolean isConfigured()
        Indicates if the authentication mode is configured and ready for use. For example, a user may need to configure the OS to use a particular feature, such as bio-fingerprint, at least one fingerprint needs to be enrolled before this authentication mode can be used.
        Returns:
        true if configured, else return false.
